channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 05:37 Air alarm in the city of Kyiv. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 05:37 Air alarm in the city of Kyiv. Stay tuned for further messages. #м_Київ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 03:28 Repulse of alarm in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Marganets and Marganets territorial community- Myrivska territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol territorial community- Pokrovska territorial community- Chervonogrigorivska territorial community
